mapper.select: SELECT A.BACKUP_RESULT_ID, A.BACKUP_OPERT_ID, B.BACKUP_OPERT_NM, A.BACKUP_FILE, B.BACKUP_ORGINL_DRCTRY, B.BACKUP_STRE_DRCTRY, A.STTUS, C.CODE_NM STTUS_NM, A.ERROR_INFO, A.EXECUT_BEGIN_TM, A.EXECUT_END_TM, TO_CHAR(A.LAST_UPDT_PNTTM, 'YYYY-MM-DD HH24:MI:SS') AS LAST_UPDT_PNTTM, A.LAST_UPDUSR_ID, A.FRST_REGISTER_ID, TO_CHAR(A.FRST_REGIST_PNTTM, 'YYYY-MM-DD HH24:MI:SS') AS FRST_REGIST_PNTTM FROM COMTNBACKUPRESULT A, COMTNBACKUPOPERT B, COMTCCMMNDETAILCODE C WHERE A.BACKUP_OPERT_ID = B.BACKUP_OPERT_ID AND A.STTUS = C.CODE AND C.CODE_ID = 'COM076' AND A.BACKUP_RESULT_ID = #{backupResultId}
